--RAM de ejemplo
signal RAM : RamType := (  			X"08010000", X"09020004", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"04221800", X"00000000", X"1063FFF9", X"0C830004", -- posiciones 0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7
									X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", --posicones 8,9,...
									X"20000000", X"20000000", X"30018001", X"02AD6093", X"30008001", X"00000001", X"20000000", X"30002001",
									X"00010900", X"20000000", X"30004000", X"5000102D", X"01000300", X"80000400", X"10000000", X"00000000",
									X"00002000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000002", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000002",
									X"00000000", X"00000002", X"00001200", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000002", X"00000000", X"00000002",
									X"000006AD", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000",
									X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00100000", X"00000000", X"00000000",
									X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"02000000", X"08010000", X"00000000",
									X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000010", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000002", X"00200000",
									X"00000000", X"20080001", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000800", X"40000000", X"00000000", X"00000000",
									X"00000000", X"000009C2", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000800", X"00000000", X"00080800", X"00000000",
									X"00080000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000",
									X"00002000", X"00400000", X"00080000", X"00000000", X"00080000", X"00000000", X"50000000", X"00000001",
									X"40020000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"40000000", X"00000000", X"00000004", X"00000800", X"00800004",
									X"20800000", X"00000004", X"00000000", X"00000004", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"20000000", X"00000004");


--RAM test la
-- Se guarda en r1 un 1 desde memoria y se carga la dir 8 (r4) donde se guardara el dato,
-- despues se usa LA para calcular el dato a guradar usando el registro r1 + inmediato y se guarda en la dir almacenada en r4.
-- En este test se incluye un salto que falla, donde se ejemplifica un caso especial del predictor en el cual se "predice" sin que 
-- los datos del predictor sean validos
--	08010000	LW  R1, 0(R0)												
--	00000000	nop															  
--	20040008	LA  R4, 8(R0) //da 8																
--	20230009	LA  R3, 9(R1) //da A		  															
--	00000000	nop															
--	1004FFFA	beq r0, r4, dir0	//no salta												  
--	0C830000	SW  R3, 4(R4)		//guarda A en la dir 8																																	
signal RAM : RamType := (  			X"08010000", X"00000000", X"20040008", X"20230009", X"00000000", X"1004FFFA", X"0C830000", X"00000000",  -- posiciones 0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7
									X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000",  --posicones 8,9,...
									X"20000000", X"20000000", X"30018001", X"02AD6093", X"30008001", X"00000001", X"20000000", X"30002001",
									X"00010900", X"20000000", X"30004000", X"5000102D", X"01000300", X"80000400", X"10000000", X"00000000",
									X"00002000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000002", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000002",
									X"00000000", X"00000002", X"00001200", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000002", X"00000000", X"00000002",
									X"000006AD", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000",
									X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00100000", X"00000000", X"00000000",
									X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"02000000", X"08010000", X"00000000",
									X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000010", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000002", X"00200000",
									X"00000000", X"20080001", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000800", X"40000000", X"00000000", X"00000000",
									X"00000000", X"000009C2", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000800", X"00000000", X"00080800", X"00000000",
									X"00080000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000",
									X"00002000", X"00400000", X"00080000", X"00000000", X"00080000", X"00000000", X"50000000", X"00000001",
									X"40020000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"40000000", X"00000000", X"00000004", X"00000800", X"00800004",
									X"20800000", X"00000004", X"00000000", X"00000004", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"20000000", X"00000004");
									
--RAM test bne (Con predictor)
--  Suma r1 (1) con r2 (2 al comienzo) y lo compara con r5(4) para volver al comienzo del bucle (dir 1)
--  Al salir del bucle el valor de la suma (4) se guarda en la dir C de memoria (r3 + 8)
--	08010000	LW  R1, 0(R0)
--	08050008	LW  R2, 4(R8) //dir1
--	09020004	LW  R5, 8(R0)
--	00000000	nop
--	00000000	nop
--	04221800	ADD R3, R1, R2
--	00000000	nop
--	00000000	nop
--	0C830004	SW  R3, 4(R4)
--	1465FFF7	bne r3, r5, dir1
--	0C630008	SW  R3, 8(R3)
signal RAM : RamType := (  			X"08010000", X"08050008", X"09020004", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"04221800", X"00000000", X"00000000", -- posiciones 0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7
									X"0C830004", X"1465FFF7", X"0C630008", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", --posicones 8,9,...
									X"20000000", X"20000000", X"30018001", X"02AD6093", X"30008001", X"00000001", X"20000000", X"30002001",
									X"00010900", X"20000000", X"30004000", X"5000102D", X"01000300", X"80000400", X"10000000", X"00000000",
									X"00002000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000002", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000002",
									X"00000000", X"00000002", X"00001200", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000002", X"00000000", X"00000002",
									X"000006AD", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000",
									X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00100000", X"00000000", X"00000000",
									X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"02000000", X"08010000", X"00000000",
									X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000010", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000002", X"00200000",
									X"00000000", X"20080001", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000800", X"40000000", X"00000000", X"00000000",
									X"00000000", X"000009C2", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000800", X"00000000", X"00080800", X"00000000",
									X"00080000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000",
									X"00002000", X"00400000", X"00080000", X"00000000", X"00080000", X"00000000", X"50000000", X"00000001",
									X"40020000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"40000000", X"00000000", X"00000004", X"00000800", X"00800004",
									X"20800000", X"00000004", X"00000000", X"00000004", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"20000000", X"00000004");




--RAM test prediccion, debe realizar 3 iteraciones, al finalizar guarda el resultado en la pos 4 (un 5)
-- Comprueba el fallo de prediccion de sentido
-- 	20210005 	LA R1, 5(R0)
-- 	08020000	LW R2, 0(R0) //dir1
-- 	08050004	LW R5, 4(R0)
--  00000000	nop
-- 	00000000	nop
-- 	04451800	ADD R3, R2,R5
-- 	00000000	nop
-- 	00000000	nop
-- 	0C030004	SW  R3, 4(R0)
-- 	1461FFF7	BNE R3,R1, dir1
-- 	0C030008	SW  R3, 8(R0)
signal RAM : RamType := (  			X"20210005", X"08020000", X"08050004", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"04451800", X"00000000", X"00000000", -- posiciones 0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7
									X"0C030004", X"1461FFF7", X"0C030008", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", --posicones 8,9,...
									X"20000000", X"20000000", X"30018001", X"02AD6093", X"30008001", X"00000001", X"20000000", X"30002001",
									X"00010900", X"20000000", X"30004000", X"5000102D", X"01000300", X"80000400", X"10000000", X"00000000",
									X"00002000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000002", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000002",
									X"00000000", X"00000002", X"00001200", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000002", X"00000000", X"00000002",
									X"000006AD", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000",
									X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00100000", X"00000000", X"00000000",
									X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"02000000", X"08010000", X"00000000",
									X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000010", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000002", X"00200000",
									X"00000000", X"20080001", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000800", X"40000000", X"00000000", X"00000000",
									X"00000000", X"000009C2", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000800", X"00000000", X"00080800", X"00000000",
									X"00080000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"00000000",
									X"00002000", X"00400000", X"00080000", X"00000000", X"00080000", X"00000000", X"50000000", X"00000001",
									X"40020000", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"40000000", X"00000000", X"00000004", X"00000800", X"00800004",
									X"20800000", X"00000004", X"00000000", X"00000004", X"00000000", X"00000000", X"20000000", X"00000004");
